sentences.en: AIM : To evaluate the curative effect of krypton yellow laser in treatment of diabetic macular edema.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究氪黄激光光凝治疗糖尿病黄斑水肿的疗效.

sentences.en: Better you come from Earth or Krypton ( Where Superman came from ), nether Mars nor Mercury.
sentences.cn: 你最好来自地球或者克里普顿 ( 超人家乡 ), 别是火星或水星.

sentences.en: Lead oxide in seal frit used for making window assemblies for Argon and Krypton laser tubes.
sentences.cn: 用于氩和氪激光管防护窗组合件的封装玻璃料里的铅的氧化物.

sentences.en: Objective To analyse the effectiveness of treatment and prevention of retinal detachment by krypton laser.
sentences.cn: 目的氪多波长激光和预防视网膜脱离的效果.

sentences.en: Objective To analyse the effectiveness of treatment and prevention of retinal detachment krypton laser.
sentences.cn: 目的分析氪多波长激光治疗和预防视网膜脱离的效果.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of krypton yellow laser photocoagulation for central serous chorioretinopathy ( CSC ).
sentences.cn: 目的评价氪黄激光治疗中心性浆液性脉络膜视网膜病变(centralscrous chorioretinopathy,CSC ) 的临床效果.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effect of krypton laser photocoagulation on branch retinal vein occlusion.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨氪黄激光治疗视网膜分支静脉阻塞的方法和疗效.

sentences.en: One of the most successful combinations was trypan blue dye used with a krypton a laser.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,锥虫蓝染料与氪激光器的结合使用是最成功的结合使用之一.

sentences.en: Places stress on krypton lamp current repair and light channel adjustment.
sentences.cn: 着重叙述了氪灯电路的修理和光路的调整.

sentences.en: The krypton and xenon isotope ratios in the gas samples provided a surprising result: They did not match the ratios found in the primordial cloud that spawned the solar system.
sentences.cn: 气体采样中的氪和氙同位素比值产生了一个令人吃惊的结果：这些比值跟在形成太阳系的原始云团中所发现的比值不一致。
星球的名字叫克雷普顿.

sentences.en: The technology on Krypton, Superman's home world , was based on manipulating the growth of crystals.
sentences.cn: 超人家乡氪星的科技来自于对水晶成长的操控.

sentences.en: Xenon and krypton are not retained by the body so they have little effect.
sentences.cn: 氙和氪不能在人体内停留所以对人体影响很小。

trans.tran_en: Krypton is an element that is found in the air in the form of a gas. It is used in fluorescent lights and lasers.
